findings.title: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: State variable visibility is not set.

findings.title: Potential use of “block.number” as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness can be insecure.

findings.title: Owner can transfer tokens from other addresses
findings.description: The owner has the capability to transfer tokens from other addresses without any restrictions.
